reviewText:
There are some interesting dances on this, maybe three or four.  The last dance number is a showstopper.  Otherwise, I found this boring.  I should add that the majority of the bellydance that I have seen on film that I like came from World Dance New York, which is more American Tribal, and much less Classical Egyptian.

Amar Ghamal is very, very impressive as a Classical Egyptian dancer.  If you want to see her performances, then definitely include this in your collection. Otherwise, maybe not.
